lead_paragraph: After a secretive two-year development and production process and a fake marketing campaign for a nonexistent film called “The Woods,” a new “Blair Witch” sequel was unveiled.

headline.print_headline: In a Gleeful Twist at a Horror Film Screening, ‘Blair Witch’ Is Revived
headline.main: In a Gleeful Twist at a Horror Film Screening, ‘Blair Witch’ Is Revived

snippet: After a secretive two-year development and production process and a fake marketing campaign for a nonexistent film called “The Woods,” a new “Blair Witch” sequel was unveiled....
abstract: Lionsgate sequel to movie The Blair Witch Project is sprung on sneak preview audiences in San Diego who thought they had purchased tickets for new horror movie The Woods; fake marketing campaign, which included posters and trailers, is stunningly successful, with sequel, titled simply Blair Witch, trending worldwide on Twitter within hours of San Diego screening.
